name: Dust Fury
description:
Dust Fury

The world has changed..now you must race your way through a multitude of racetracks to survive...

Dust Fury is a DOS-based racing game, harkening back to the spirit of low-polygon and future/apocalyptic environments.

This is currently a work-in progress and this one level racer is currently only a time-trial lap.

More levels, opponents, etc are coming soon.

Team:

Code - @BananaboySam

Code & Gfx - @shockdesign

Gfx, Models & Track layout - @mikehdt

Concept art - @arle13
